parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return the unit position rules.

<br>The return value is always "Auto" unless the unit has gotten a [[setUnitPos]] command. In that case the value is the last stance the unit was ordered to.
<br>Available modes are listed at [[setUnitPos]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''unitPos''' unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[unitPos]] _unit;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>mp </name>=<value> Unit pos set by [[setUnitPosWeak]] is not returned for remote (non-local) units.</value></part><part><name/>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setUnitPos]], [[setUnitPosWeak]], [[stance]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
